00021 #ifndef __BLI_MD5_H__
00022 #define __BLI_MD5_H__ 
00023 
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 #include <stdlib.h>
00030 
00031 /* Compute MD5 message digest for LEN bytes beginning at BUFFER.  The
00032  * result is always in little endian byte order, so that a byte-wise
00033  * output yields to the wanted ASCII representation of the message
00034  * digest.  */
00035 
00036 void *md5_buffer(const char *buffer, size_t len, void *resblock);
00037 
00038 /* Compute MD5 message digest for bytes read from STREAM.  The
00039  * resulting message digest number will be written into the 16 bytes
00040  * beginning at RESBLOCK.  */
00041 
00042 int md5_stream(FILE *stream, void *resblock);
00043 
00044 #endif
